title: Saara Lehtonen
bioParagraphs: Saara Lehtonen is a freelance actress, singer and a voice talent. Saara has worked mostly as a musical artist in professional theatre productions for two decades.

Most beloved roles for Saara have been Éponine in Les Misérables (Tampere Theatre 2013), Georgie Bukatinsky in Full Monty, (Samppalinna summer theatre 2012), Linda in Bloodbrothers (Tampere Theatre 2012) and Fru Brill in Mary Poppins (Svenska Teatern 2020)

Alongside theatre productions Saara also works as a voice talent. During her career Saara has been the Finnish voice for characters like Pinkie Pie (My Little Pony Friendship Magic), Dora (Dora the Explorer), Everest (Paw Patrol). Saara is also a voice director, audio book narrator and a voice over artist for commercials.
